title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when using SWT.MULTI
description: When selecting the option SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, the application produces an unexpected beeping sound. This behavior is not intended and seems to indicate an error.
OB: After choosing the SWT.MULTI option, clicking on other buttons within the application also triggers the beeping sound.
EB: Upon performing the described actions, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard, indicating an incorrect operation.
SR: Investigate and resolve the unexpected beeping sound when using SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText.
